cause.description:
In 2001, President George W. Bush declared a War on Terrorism to rout out Al-Qaeda and its threat to the United States of America. This group supports the war that is being fought on two fronts: Afghanistan and Iraq.
1. The United States must stay in Iraq until Iraq is stabilized.
2. The United States must continue to pursue Al-Qaeda.
cause.mission: gain more support for the war on terrorism.
cause.name: The War on Terror
